channel.title: Avarrocka/Astrect - Released - Client
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Dv0pFKF.png[/img][/center] [hr]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fC84Y0M.png[/img] Avarrocka is a server like no other server. It is made to entertain. Avarrocka will be a server with many features. It will be have perfectly made minigames, skills and bosses as well as a great combat system. This server is based on Apollo. This isn’t a rushed project, so keep that in mind. Our team is still working hard on getting each feature to perfection. We’ve set many goals to accomplish in our development. Please support us and prove some feedback about our progress once it will be showed. [hr]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/STQ5egz.png[/img]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VoZPaJefV1Y]Avarrocka - Skilling Orbs. - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VsjbO9IfFqM]Avarrocka - Loading & Login. - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cvxqwpQThnc]Avarrocka - Advanced GameFrame System. - YouTube[/url]
[center]True full screen fully working. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hlVV8nl.png[/img]
Re-sizable screen with closed tab and chat. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mXfNVRc.png[/img]
Re-sizable screen fully working. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5MYV4rm.png[/img]
474 Gameframe. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Aj6jxwM.png[/img]
Loading screen. (Rotating circle + load speed depends of your computer processor performance, mine loads at 2 seconds) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y3yyB9f.png[/img]
LoginScreen, still in progress. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TFHxzqg.png[/img]
LoginScreen - Finished [img]http://i.imgur.com/KrQXRQ2.jpg[/img]
Task system - client sided fully done. [img]http://i.imgur.com/eVu85PZ.png[/img][/center]
[size=18pt][b][u]You must know. I've spended 5 months working on this client. 1: The media shown in this thread is outdated, it has newer things and a lot of improvements. 2: This is not a download-ready-to-be-used-client. Except to figure out some custom packets. 3: Just to show you the packaging(Took a lot of time making it OO):
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cmnV74i.png[/img]
Credits (Please show respect if you'll use it): 1. Artem Batutin 2. Rob Bubletan 3. Steve Kreitzer 4. Ryley Kimmel [/u][/b]
Download(SAY THANKS AT LEAST!): http://uppit.com/y9iw636lh71a/client.rar [/size]

item.title: Avarrocka/Astrect - Released - Client
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:35, topic:536282”][quote author=artem543 link=topic=655094.msg4394464#msg4394464 date=1388696833]

Well isn’t that rude.

Not really

Seriously, I can’t imagine this being on the 3rd page… It has way more potential that a leech-done server -.-
[/quote]
Except that no one knows how to get it to work with their server haha.[/quote]

Packet 71 - setInterfaceTab

Tab ID
Interface ID
Old or New Gameframe (0: old, 1:new)

Read full topic

item.title: Avarrocka/Astrect - Released - Client
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“frozenearth, post:29, topic:536282”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=655094.msg4389706#msg4389706 date=1387042360]

how to use the client? there is no run.bat in it. ?

Make one or get an IDE.
[/quote]

everytime i create a run.bat it doesnt work. can anyone create one for me?[/quote]

@echo off
Title Client
java  -Xmx1024m org.astrect.Game 30 0 highmem members 32
pause

Place that in the bin folder.
Also, your cache goes in the same folder unless you edited the signlink

Read full topic

[quote=“Docent, post:16, topic:536282”][quote author=artem543 link=topic=655094.msg4386987#msg4386987 date=1385959173]

Heh, Avvorcka. I do indeed remember this. Wrote a lot of story line and character bios for this server.

Yes but I won`t help you out. There is tons of tutorials out there.
And after you went away with an idiot.
[/quote]bad decisions are made in life, gotta learn from them. I did learn from that one.
but from what I remember, you didn’t do so well after I left anyway.

Haha, nice catch. I might would of done if you would support me. However, I am still working on a client

Do you know how to load maps (not landscape) onto clients?[/quote]
